metadata.title: CVE-2017-8761 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: In OpenStack Swift through 2.10.1, 2.11.0 through 2.13.0, and 2.14.0, theproxy-server logs full tempurl paths, potentially leaking reusable tempurlsignatures to anyone with read access to these logs. All Swift deploymentsusing the tempurl middleware are affected.

criterions.comment: swift package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
